title: Print, Title Page from OEUVRES/DE/CUVILLIÈS/PÈRE ET FILS/3E RECUEIL/1R VOLUME, 1745
title_raw: Title Page from OEUVRES/DE/CUVILLIÈS/PÈRE ET FILS/3E RECUEIL/1R VOLUME
medium: Black ink and graphite on off-white laid paper
inscribed: Written on sheet in black ink, central compartment: 3e.. Recueil/OEUVRES/de FRANÇOIS De CUVILLIÈS/Père et Fils/ARCHITECTES/de/S.A.S.E. de BAVIÈRE/et de/COLOGNE/1er.. Volume.; written on sheet in graphite, lower center: Dessin original Moderne.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Drawn title page (not original) for miscellaneous volume with prints after François II de Cuvillès. Rocaille design borders text, which reads: 3e.. Recueil/OEUVRES/de FRANÇOIS De CUVILLIÈS/Père et Fils/ARCHITECTES/de/S.A.S.E. de BAVIÈRE/et de/COLOGNE/1er.. Volume. Volume itself in modern, half leather binding with marbled borads, on the spine: OEUVRES DE CUVILLIÈS/PÈRE ET FILS/3E RECUEIL/1R VOLUME. The volume is 45 cm by 31.2cm. The volume was rebound in 1974.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Title Page from OEUVRES/DE/CUVILLIÈS/PÈRE ET FILS/3E RECUEIL/1R VOLUME, 1745. Black ink and graphite on off-white laid paper. 
Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-1
